snippet: The New Jersey Symphony Orchestra kicked off its third Winter Festival, the theme of which is “Air and the Atmosphere.”
abstract: Steve Smith reviews performance by New Jersey Symphony Orchestra at New Jersey Performing Arts Center, part of orchestra's third Winter Festival.
lead_paragraph: The New Jersey Symphony Orchestra kicked off its third Winter Festival, the theme of which is “Air and the Atmosphere.”

headline.seo: New Jersey Symphony Orchestra at Prudential Hall
headline.main: A Personal Touch Helps Evoke a Universal Truth
